Description.Text: Set in a prime location of Edinburgh, Castle View Guest House puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room, laundry service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Edinburgh has to offer by making Castle View Guest House your base.
